comments.body:
I opened a PR upstream to fix having to manually package the license file (https://github.com/huggingface/datasets/pull/1007). Please add the following comment as a visual reminder to check the status of whether the license file is in the source distribution:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/huggingface/datasets/pull/1007
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +43,47 @@  license_family: Apache
  # License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/huggingface/datasets/pull/1007
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "HuggingFace/Datasets is an open library of NLP datasets."
  doc_url: https://huggingface.co/docs/datasets/
